predict_bboxes[source]

predict_bboxes(path_to_model_config:str, path_to_image:str, outfile:str, processing_dir:str='temp', tile_size:int=400, tile_overlap:int=100, coco_set:str=None, use_tta:bool=True, postproc_results:bool=True, smooth_preds:bool=False)

Detect bounding boxes from a new image using a pretrained model

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

predict_bboxes_detectron2[source]

predict_bboxes_detectron2(path_to_model_config:"Path to pretrained model folder", path_to_image:"Path to image to annotate", outfile:"Path and filename for output raster", processing_dir:"Directory to save the intermediate tiles. Deleted after use", tile_size:"Tile size to use. Default 400x400px tiles", tile_overlap:"Tile overlap to use. Default 100px", coco_set:"Path to json file for the coco dataset the model was trained on", use_tta:"Use test-time augmentation", postproc_results:"Filter predicted masks", smooth_preds:"Run fill_holes and dilate_erode to masks")

CLI for bbox prediction with detectron2

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

predict_instance_masks[source]

predict_instance_masks(path_to_model_config:str, path_to_image:str, outfile:str, processing_dir:str='temp', tile_size:int=400, tile_overlap:int=100, coco_set:str=None, use_tta:bool=True, postproc_results:bool=True, smooth_preds:bool=False)

Segment instance masks from a new image using a pretrained model

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

predict_instance_masks_detectron2[source]

predict_instance_masks_detectron2(path_to_model_config:"Path to pretrained model folder", path_to_image:"Path to image to annotate", outfile:"Path and filename for output raster", processing_dir:"Directory to save the intermediate tiles. Deleted after use", tile_size:"Tile size to use. Default 400x400px tiles", tile_overlap:"Tile overlap to use. Default 100px", coco_set:"Path to json file for the coco dataset the model was trained on", use_tta:"Use test-time augmentation", postproc_results:"Filter predicted masks", smooth_preds:"Run fill_holes and dilate_erode to masks")

CLI for instance segmentation with detectron2
